branchCategory.name: ARX20
branchCategory.description: <p>Air Regulator Series ARX20 is a piston type regulator. It is compatible with a primary supply pressure of 2.0MPa and is ideal for pressure adjustment of air blowing applications. The ARX has a compact design with a width of 35mm and an overall length of 80mm. The piston operated design ensures long operating life. The ARX has an easy-to-operate adjustment handle.</p>

branchItem.name: ARX20, Regulator for 2MPa
